alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven; Tyrrell; Washington; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jones, southern Washington, eastern Craven, northwestern Hyde, northeastern Onslow, Beaufort, southwestern Tyrrell, west central Carteret and Pamlico Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 744 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Terra Ceia to Coastal Carolina Regional Airport to near River Bend to Camp Lejeune Center. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, New River Station, Camp Lejeune Center, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, Cape Carteret, Belhaven, Sladesville, Ransomville and Ponzer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven; Tyrrell; Washington; West Carteret
